EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Information (1316204096.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Information (1316204096.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Eduardo,
It was a pleasure speaking with you. I’ve enclosed a few things as summary to our call:
Link to our benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits Our Full Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf
Here is the information you were looking for:
Estimate with Gross Pay at 80 Estimate with Gross Pay at 85 Estimate with Gross Pay at 90 Estimate with Gross Pay at 80 but with exemptions at 0
Action Items as we discussed: - Reenrollment with MBO in our system by clicking the ‘enrollment’ link once you are logged into your business center - Introduction to the client when the time is right - Contract Addendum edits for MBO/Ed agreement (you’ll see the contract online when you are enrolling)
I will follow up with you as a courtesy, but feel free to email or call me should you have any questions. Best way to reach me over the weekend is via email.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
